content:
During the day he made 3 attempts of storms on the Left Bank of the Dnieper and 9 - in the areas of the robot and the Swing Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreported March 19Defense forces of South of Ukraine.

The enemy systematically tries to knock out our units from the occupied positions both in the area of the bridgeheads of the Left Bank and in the Zaporozhye region.

The invaders mostly acted in groups, without the support of armored vehicles. Having suffered losses, they went to the starting positions.

No hostile aerial intelligence stops, both along the collision line and in the Black Sea.

At night, 3 enemy drones of Zala type were destroyed in Odesa region.

BeforeThe Armyinform reported, who detained a Russian agent in Mykolaiv region, who was spying on the Armed Forces with drones.
title: In the south the enemy presses artillery shelling and shock drones
description: This was reported on March 19 by the forces of southern Ukraine. The enemy is systematically trying ...
author: Army Inform
